entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of snow late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
